name: blueshift (itch) (Cade Sayner)
description:
In this arcade style, top-down shooter game, you must destroy incoming waves of enemies to earn points. However there is a twist, the projectiles that you shoot only deal damage when they are "rewinding".

Get the highest score you can!

Use power-ups to give you score bonuses and to ward off enemies.

See where you place against others by checking out the leaderboard.
